2089890.name: REPLICORE
2089890.description:
CO-OP ACTION FOR UP TO 4 PLAYERS

In search of digital salvation, your crew of mercenaries finds itself stranded on a long abandoned planet, harboring a deep secret at its heart. Fight your way through deserted ruins - alone or in a team of up to four! Transform into your Core to roll, dash, and drift through the air. When a teammate is in a Core, launch them into the action or pull them out of tight spots to overcome the challenges of the dangerous ruins.

You have your crew in your hand!

SHIFT INTO THE CORE

  • You are not bound to your body - Switch from human to Core and vice versa at any time. Roll, dash and drift through the air to take advantage of your Core's advanced mobility.

  • You throw your crew to the target - Grab a teammate as a Core and toss them into otherwise unreachable locations.

  • You chose your path - The levels in REPLICORE are designed for versatile use of your Cores. Roll through the ventilations system, solve puzzles and blast though walls to open new paths. Be creative with your Core!

  • You are the grenade - Use the Cores in combat to gain the upper hand in battle. Let teammates pull you out of though situations or throw you into tactical positions. Against special opponents, you can use the Outburst explosion in an ultimate offensive strike.

EXPLORE ANCIENT RUINS

  • Handcrafted Missions - Challenge the ancient ruins of KOLEHO, a desert planet shrouded in mystery! Each ruin offers a unique and highly replayable gameplay experience. Explore fallen temples, forgotten cities, abandoned factories as you uncover the secrets of this world.

  • Dangerous Guardians - Beware of the mechanical guardians that dwell in the ruins - remnants of an ancient civilization gone rogue. Each enemy type has unique tactics and actions - coordinate your equipment to resist them.

  • Hidden Mysteries - The ruins hold hidden paths, mechanisms and puzzles that you will need to solve in order to progress. Teamwork is key— only by working together can you uncover the ruin’s deepest secrets.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR CORE

  • No fixed classes - You will earn experience points and high-tech ressources to upgrade your Core. Customize your weapons, equipment and abilities with Core modifications and define your role in the team.

  • Roll up in style - The Core represents you in REPLICORE. Unlock different cosmetic parts for your Core by completing missions. Mix and match the casing and other components and give it your desired look.
2089890.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 韩语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 繁体中文, 土耳其语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
